name: The Last Journey
overview: The Last Journey is a 16 exit Kaizo Light romhack. Venture with Luigi and tackle various Kaizo-themed challenges. Good game! This ROM hack has: Custom graphics Custom songs No boss Trolls Version 1.1 Some HDMA's have been added. The songs from levels "End to the Start" and "Credits" have been replaced. Difficulty at some levels has been reduced. Green Switch Palace with Yoshi's trick corrected. New trolls inserted. Flight level with increased difficulty after checkpoint. Enjoy!
